services.title: Strategic Services of MEA S.r.l.s.
services.subtitle: Making Energy Available (MEA S.r.l.s.) is a company committed to a fair and sustainable energy transition. With an operational presence in Italy and Cameroon, MEA acts as a bridge between Europe and Africa, offering concrete solutions that combine strategic consulting, applied economic research, and professional training.
services.mission: We support public, private, and third sector clients in the design, implementation, and evaluation of energy projects with high social and economic impact.
services.areas_subtitle: Five specialized areas to accompany the sustainable energy transition

service1.title: Energy Market Intelligence
service1.objective: Provide reliable data and in-depth analysis to guide strategic choices in the fields of sustainable energy and energy access.
offerings: Analysis of energy demand (domestic, commercial, public segments)
Mapping of competitors and local supply chains
Analysis of regulatory, technological, and consumption trends
Benchmarking and territorial feasibility studies
service1.clients: NGOs, development agencies, energy companies, public entities, impact investors
service1.benefit: Strategic decisions based on solid evidence, reducing investment risks.

service2.title: Economic Consulting and Energy Business Models
service2.objective: Develop solid and sustainable economic models for energy access and management.
offerings: Customized business models (PAYGo, mini-grid, CER)
Analysis of costs, tariffs, ROI, LCOE, and break-even
Economic and financial projections
Environmental and economic accounting systems
service2.clients: Start-ups, microenterprises, operational NGOs, microfinance operators
service2.benefit: Practical tools that make energy projects bankable and scalable.

service3.title: Economic Consulting and Energy Business Models
service3.objective: Develop solid and sustainable economic models for energy access and management.
offerings: Customized business models (PAYGo, mini-grid, CER)
Analysis of costs, tariffs, ROI, LCOE, and break-even
Economic and financial projections
Environmental and economic accounting systems
service3.clients: Start-ups, microenterprises, operational NGOs, microfinance operators
service3.benefit: Practical tools that make energy projects bankable and scalable.

service4.title: Energy Research and Policy
service4.objective: Support the development of inclusive energy policies based on scientific evidence.
offerings: Socioeconomic studies and energy mappings
Policy briefs and guidelines
Support in defining local and national strategies
Collaborations with universities and research centers
service4.clients: Ministries, regulatory bodies, universities, multilateral agencies
service4.benefit: Scientific evidence and concrete tools to strengthen energy governance.

service5.title: Consulting for Cooperation and Donors
service5.objective: Guide cooperation projects towards effectiveness, efficiency, and measurable impact.
offerings: Project design using Logframe approach and Theory of Change
Customized monitoring and evaluation (M&E) systems
Proposal drafting for international calls (EU, AICS, WB, GIZ)
Facilitation of multi-stakeholder partnerships and PPPs
service5.clients: International NGOs, cooperation consortia, local authorities
service5.benefit: Maximize project impact with advanced planning and evaluation tools.

service6.title: Training and Capacity Building
service6.objective: Strengthen technical and managerial skills to accelerate the sustainable energy transition.
offerings: Courses for installers, technicians, and green entrepreneurs
Programs in energy economics, project management, and green finance
Blended training (in-person/online) with certifications
Institutional training for public administration, local authorities, and NGOs
service6.clients: Training centers, universities, public entities, youth inclusion projects
service6.benefit: Training focused on employability and local development.
